page.title: 19LIFESTYLES WOLSTANTON.
page.content: Overall young people enjoy living in Wolstanton,although there is little to do to occupy recreaation time in bad weather.The amount of play areas and grass surfaces was felt tobe good for young people.The number of slides swings,roundabouts etc.was most satisfactory.A small sports complex would be very much appreciated,and well used.With regard to shopping facilities it was felt that for general provisions meat,fruit and chemists there was a large choice but for sports/hobbies, records and books Wolstanton is sadly lacking.Also considering the number of young people who posses B.M.X.bikes a track would be a useful addition.One final facility which could prove benefical is a well run youth-club for the 9-14 age group.
